namespace-authority.contact-person: Haruo Asoshina (Schlarly and Academic Information Div., Cyber Science Infrastructure Development Div.)

identifier-syntax.description:
The ncid identifier is a string of length 10, with the following composition:
(*) The first two characters must be alphabetic. The following 4 patterns are supported:
BA or BN assigned for books AA or AN assigned for serials
(*) The next 7 characters must be digits (0-9).
(*) The last character is a check sum (0-9,X).

identifier-normalization.description: Identifiers in this namespace are case sensitive.

namespace-information.description:
the ncid identifier is a sequentially assigned number that uniquely identifies an NACSIS-CAT bibliographic record. In November 2006 there were about 8 million bibliographic and 90 million holding records in NACSIS-CAT.
If a record is merged into another or if a record is deleted, its number is discontinued and never re-used.
Information on NACSIS-CAT is available at http://www.nii.ac.jp/CAT-ILL/contents-e/e_ncat_top.html.
